pricing.title: Our pricing
pricing.main-text:
🔨 Each piece is built individually
To match your style and mission

✔️ Pick from 11 blade shapes + 4 skeleton-style options
🎨 Choose from 26 handle colors
🛡 Select 17 sheath designs
⚙️ Use 5+ mounting systems
✍️ Add personalized engravings
💰 Price varies by setup
💵 Average: 150–170 USD with international delivery included 🌍

reviews.title: Reviews on Google maps
reviews.read_more_on_maps: Read more reviews on Google Maps

0.text: Excellent communication via Instagram – prompt, clear, and highly professional. All questions were addressed quickly, which made the custom ordering process smooth and straightforward. The knife itself is impeccably crafted ...

1.text:
Very pleased with the result. And I'm already thinking about getting him a younger brother)))
Quality as well as packaging at the highest level👍👍👍
I advise everyone and everyone👆👆👆
Glory to Ukraine 🇺🇦🇺🇦🇺🇦

2.text:
I am infinitely grateful to Prosta Stal for the knife. This is work from the heart, soul and with love. The order was urgent. And there was a minimum of finances. The company got into a position. And everything was done perfectly. ... I have never seen such joy from a knife in an adult man.
I recommend Prosta Stal - it is quality, design and love.

3.text: I recommend. The knife was ordered as a gift for a French knife connoisseur. The owner of the knife is very satisfied. Special thanks for the packaging.

4.text: The customer service was truly amazing! They helped me out every step of the way, from choosing the perfect knife and designing it, as well as all the way through the shipping process. I received my package with no issues and am thrilled with the end result. The packaging was professional and they added a personal touch which you don’t get with larger companies....
